Numerical and Symbolic Division

Source: R/operators.R
grapes-div-grapes.Rd

Divide numeric or character arrays element by element.

x %div% y

Arguments

x

character or numeric array.
y

character or numeric array.

Value

character or numeric array.

Examples

# div vector 
x <- c("a+1","b+2")
x %div% x
#> [1] "(a+1) / (a+1)" "(b+2) / (b+2)"

# div matrix 
x <- matrix(letters[1:4], ncol = 2)
x %div% x
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(a) / (a)" "(c) / (c)"
#> [2,] "(b) / (b)" "(d) / (d)"

# div array
x <- array(letters[1:12], dim = c(2,2,3))
y <- array(1:12, dim = c(2,2,3))
x %div% x
#> , , 1
#> 
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(a) / (a)" "(c) / (c)"
#> [2,] "(b) / (b)" "(d) / (d)"
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(e) / (e)" "(g) / (g)"
#> [2,] "(f) / (f)" "(h) / (h)"
#> 
#> , , 3
#> 
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(i) / (i)" "(k) / (k)"
#> [2,] "(j) / (j)" "(l) / (l)"
#> 
y %div% y
#> , , 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2]
#> [1,]    1    1
#> [2,]    1    1
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2]
#> [1,]    1    1
#> [2,]    1    1
#> 
#> , , 3
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2]
#> [1,]    1    1
#> [2,]    1    1
#> 
x %div% y
#> , , 1
#> 
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(a) / (1)" "(c) / (3)"
#> [2,] "(b) / (2)" "(d) / (4)"
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>      [,1]        [,2]       
#> [1,] "(e) / (5)" "(g) / (7)"
#> [2,] "(f) / (6)" "(h) / (8)"
#> 
#> , , 3
#> 
#>      [,1]         [,2]        
#> [1,] "(i) / (9)"  "(k) / (11)"
#> [2,] "(j) / (10)" "(l) / (12)"
#>
